{"id":638393782,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1644472626,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/638393782/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"43.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        if(s.isEmpty()){\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        int start = 0;\n        int end = s.length() -1;\n        \n        while(start<=end){\n            char charStart = s.charAt(start);\n            char charEnd = s.charAt(end);\n            \n            if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(charStart)){\n                start++;\n            }\n            else if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(charEnd)){\n                end--;\n            }\n            else{\n                \n                if(Character.toLowerCase(charStart) != Character.toLowerCase(charEnd)){\n                    return false;\n                }\n                start++;\n                end--;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false}
